TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Zambia, title = Zambia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zambia} }

S.FORM: Zambia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 15 00 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 752,618 sq km (maki' tay 39ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 743,398 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 9,220 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 15,510,711. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga31.70% , lhlahuy hya' ga 66.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 2%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Lusaka. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 24 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Edgar Lungu, aring ryax 25 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Zambia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 15 00 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 752,618 sq km (maki' tay 39ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 743,398 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 9,220 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 15,510,711. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga31.70% , lhlahoy hya' ga 66.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 2%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Losaka. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 24 na tay mawpow byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Edgar Longo, aring ryax 25 sqo byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
